job.title: Data Scientist (Remote)
job.description: laagencia is a recruitment partner with a focus on startup companies and smb were looking for a data analyst to join our clients team based in united states in a remote job the data scientist is responsible for managing the master data set and developing respective reportsvisualizationsthe ideal person for this position has an exceptional eye for detail expertise as a data scientist and a solid understanding of popular data analysis tools heshe will work closely with product owners across various lines of business to understand the objectives of the organization and prioritize any requirementsresponsibilities use data to inform and influence the direction of team goals and inform business decisions take ownership of key components ensuring that they meet the needs of the business evangelizing evidencebased decision making by partnering with key decisionmakers and driving general accessibility of data and insights communicate results to senior management in verbal visual and written mediadrive improvements in business outcomes by conduct hands on data mining and analysis to identify issues and improve operational processes work with internal stakeholders to ensure data integrity of daily reporting automation and customization manage pieces of operational data workflow and look to improve them by providing a scalable solutioncontinually explore and iterate statistical models and features to advance our understanding of key underlying business drivers identify and drive improvements through standardization of process authoring new best practices and cultivation of new expertise understand how to break down complex problems into the key components where data science and machine learning can be used to improve existing solutionsrequirements bachelors degree in computer science mathematics information management or a related field years of experience as a data scientist or in a related fieldability to understand business needs and relay them into easy to understand nontechnical languagehighlevel written and verbal communication skills desired skillsltligtexpertise in sql and proven comfort and an intellectual curiosity for working with large sets of dataltligtfluency in python experience developing production software is a bonusltligtability to partner collaborate and communicate well with a diverse set of
